subject: Basketball
Hockey, Ice
Television
lead_paragraph: Detroit sports fans will face a rare dilemma on Saturday and Monday nights: whether to the Red Wings in the Stanley Cup finals or the Pistons in the N.B.A. Eastern Conference finals.
snippet: Detroit sports fans will face a rare dilemma on Saturday and Monday nights: whether to the Red Wings in the Stanley Cup finals or the Pistons in the N.B.A. Eastern Conference finals.
